channel.title: Increase HSTS timeout
channel.description:
Right now it's only 5000 (83 minutes). This means that when you visit moparscape a lot of browsers wont keep you on HTTPS if you haven't visited in an hour or so. Is there any advantage to having it this low?
I propose that the HSTS timeout is increased to at least a month as I see no reason to have it that low. The only reason I can think of is certificate expiry, but it could simply be replaced a month or so before it expires (it's free anyway).
